content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the municipal court čakovec on december 11 2021 the case involves the termination of coownership of a property the applicant identified as ha and the counterparty identified as mm are coowners of the property the applicant filed a motion to terminate the coownership and proposed that the property be sold at a public auction with the proceeds divided between the coowners according to their shares the court reviewed the motion and relevant documents including a valuation report and determined that the property could be divided without significantly reducing its value therefore the court issued a resolution to terminate the coownership and ordered the sale of the property the costs of the procedure totaling 6000 kuna are to be borne by the coowners in proportion to their shares the parties are responsible for their own legal representation costs the resolution also states that the parties may sell the property outside of court if they agree but if not a separate enforcement procedure must be initiated the decision regarding the costs of representation is in accordance with the former act on extrajudicial procedure

civil_codes_used: Paragraph 283 of the former Act on extra-judicial procedure (July 26, 1934)
